"There are many other parents who have experienced the same situation and who have written to us asking for a legal duty of care at higher education institutions. "I feel the same way about this. "I want to see more research done into ways that higher education institutions can help with mental health issues. "I hope that the Scottish government will pass this legislation, but we are not.
